name: face-detection-app
description: Full-stack face detection app with React frontend and Node.js backend

scripts.build: npm run install-deps && cd client && npm run build && cd ../server && cp -r ../client/build/* public/
scripts.install-deps: cd server && npm install && cd ../client && npm install
scripts.clean-install: rm -rf server/node_modules client/node_modules && npm run install-deps
